title: Pelosi says Democrats reviewing proposals to ban lawmaker stock trading and expects action this year - CNN
content:
1. Pelosi says Democrats reviewing proposals to ban lawmaker stock trading and expects action this year  CNN
  2. Pelosi wants any stock trading ban to be 'government wide'  Fox Business
  3. Congress Facing Growing Pressure Over Lawmakers Trading Stocks  NBC News
  4. Stock Trading Ban for Lawmakers Gains Momentum on Capitol Hill  The New York Times
  5. What stocks do NY congressional lawmakers own?  Spectrum News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Speaker Nancy Pelosi indicated on Wednesday that House Democrats are looking into potential policy proposals to ban lawmaker stock trading and working to find a consensus so they can take action this year.
